projects: [{"title":"Spray Thin Film Cathode for Thermal Battery","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Present","description":"Supervisor: Prof. Parth Pratim Bandyopadhyay• Different approaches for making the pyrite thin film cathode for the thermal battery.• Methods for achieving the equilibrium number of phases in mixtures suitable for use in battery electrodes"},{"title":"Data Analytics Project : Bellabeat case study","start_date":"Sep 2023","end_date":"Sep 2023","description":"Analyze the Smart Device data (FitBit Fitness Tracker Data) to gain insight into how customers are using their smart devices using R and made Visualization of Analysis using R.• Pulled the fitbit fitness tracker data (CC0: Public Domain, dataset made available through Mobius) from kaggle.• Build data models and charts to generate meaningful insight from FitBit data.• Drafted and wrote R markdown report of complete code with all data visualization charts."},{"title":"Visual Communication","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"Survey on Mark Rothko's most famous paintings.compared the emotional responses of people and the responses with the emotional affect of colour chart on the Mark Rothko's paintings by using machine learning."}]
